case.title: Here's To Hoping -
case.text:
hi I am looking for someone to fulfill my emotional and physical needs. I am not getting what I once did in my current situation. I am drama free, sweet and down to earth. For the right person I will go out of my way to make each and every day happier. I expect the same.
I am seeking someone who would be willing to be able to and want to text often....day and night
